alert.note: Alert for Alger; Baraga; Houghton; Keweenaw; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 01 at 9:00PM EDT until May 02 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 15 inches. The lightest accumulations will be near the lakeshore. The heaviest will be in the high terrain to the southeast of L`anse and to the west and northwest of Negaunee. Northwest winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Northern Houghton, Baraga, Marquette and Alger Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. With the heavy, wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the strong winds will cause tree damage and power outages. The snow will also be difficult to move.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
